DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety ziprasidone aripiprazole hospitalize patient schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Efficacy Safety Ziprasidone Aripiprazole Treatment fo Schizophrenia Schizoaffective Disorder Hospitalized Patients
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patient schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder At least 6th grade read level Males female , 18 70 year age time consent Subjects must hospitalize 14 consecutive day immediately prior screen Psychiatric disorder schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder History arrhythmia , heart attack , heart failure
